generic.note: An Area of Effect icon has been added to all tooltip values that are affected by Bloodstone and other AoE increases
The Mines map aura: Mighty Mines health regen aura decreased from +7 to +5
The Well map aura: Well Wishes mana regen aura decreased from +1.5 to 1.2
Starting from his second death, Roshan now always drops Roshan's Banner
Starting from his third death Roshan now drops Refresher Shard and Cheese during daytime or Aghanim's Blessing during night
Teleport time to Roshan's outposts decreased from 6s to 4s
The following are considered a Teleport:
The breakability rules of facets, innates, and abilities have been updated
"Breakable: Yes" has been added to all abilities that are partially or fully disabled by Break
All abilities that are partially disabled by Break have an alt+tooltip line detailing Break interactions
The following are now Fully Disabled by Break:
Alchemist: Greevil's Greed (including bounty rune multiplier)
Bloodseeker: Thirst (including removal of movement speed cap)
Bounty Hunter: Jinada (including Shuriken Toss applying Jinada on hit)
Nature's Prophet: Spirit of the Forest
The following are now Partially Disabled by Break:
Chaos Knight: Phantasmagoria (Break disables the passive damage reduction aura)
Ember Spirit: Immolation (Immolation is not disabled for Fire Remnants when upgraded with Aghanim's Shard)
Juggernaut: Bladeform (Break disables the gaining of new stacks. Break does not disable the passive bonuses from existing stacks)
Lifestealer: Feast (including the ability to deny creeps at 75%. Break disables the gaining of new stacks. Break does not disable the passives bonuses from existing stacks)
Monkey King: Jingu Mastery (Break disables the gaining of new stacks. Break does not disable the bonuses from existing stacks)
Primal Beast: Uproar (Break disables the passive attack damage bonus. Break disables the gaining of new stacks)
Storm Spirit: Galvanized (Break disables the gaining of new stacks from kills)
Tidehunter: Kraken Shell (Break disables the gaining of new stacks. Break does not disable the bonuses from existing stacks)
Troll Warlord: Fervor (Break disables the gaining of new stacks. Break disables the proc chance granted by Aghanim's Shard. Break no longer disables the attack speed buff from existing stacks)
Visage: Gravekeeper's Cloak (Break disables the gaining of new stacks. Break does not disable the bonuses from existing stacks)
Wraith King: Bone Guard (Break disables the gaining of new stacks)
The following are no longer Disabled by Break:
Abilities that are applied with attacks can no longer be blocked or reflected. The following abilities have had their behavior changed:
Beastmaster: Call of the Wild Hawk Dive Bomb
Ogre Magi: Fireblast when applied by attacking with the Level 25 Talent (including any Multicasts from the attack)
Abilities that can be unit or point targeted, but do not track their target when unit targeted can no longer be blocked or reflected. The following abilities have had their behavior changed:
Abilities that track their target when unit targeted can be blocked or reflected. The following abilities have had their behavior changed:
Abilities that can be unit targeted and displaces the caster are now blocked on ability cast instead of after displacement. The following abilities have had their behavior changed:
Sven: Storm Hammer with Aghanim's Scepter

Abilities that fire a projectile at a primary target and affect an area around them now only trigger spell block and reflection on the primary target. The following abilities have had their behavior changed:

generic.info: It is no longer blocked or reflected when casted automatically from the Snot Rocket Facet
it no longer spreads when blocked

generic.note: Abilities that fire individual tracking projectiles at targets to apply the same effect to all units hit now trigger spell block and reflection independently. The following abilities have had their behavior changed:
Bane: Brain Sap with Aghanim's Shard
Lion: Finger of Death with Aghanim's Scepter
Nyx Assassin: Mind Flare with Level 25 Talent
Skywrath Mage: Ancient Seal with Aghanim's Scepter
Visage: Soul Assumption with Level 15 Talent

generic.info: It is now blockable/reflectable by all targets in Area of Effect

generic.note: Unit target abilities that bounce between multiple targets will only trigger spell block and reflection on the primary target. The ability continues but subsequent targets do not trigger block/reflection. The following abilities have had their behavior changed:
Medusa: Mystic Snake. When casted by Cold Blooded, no longer trigger block/reflection
Nature's Prophet: Wrath of Nature, regardless if it was Unit or Point targeted
Vengeful Spirit: Magic Missile with Aghanim's Shard
Zeus: Arc Lightning. When casted by auto-attacks with Aghanim's Shard, it does not trigger block/reflection
Neutral item active effects can no longer be blocked or reflected. The following items have had their behavior changed:

Starting at level 5, wolves gain Hamstring, an attack modifier that applies a 0.5s root and the next 4 attacks from units under Lycan's control deal an additional 50 physical damage. Cooldown: 8s
Starting at level 6, wolves gain Hightail. When activated, wolves get a burst of energy, gaining hasted and phased movement, 100% evasion, and 20 attack speed for 8s. Cooldown: 50s
Wolves summoned with Aghanim's Shard are improved when leveling Summon Wolves past level 4

New basic ability.

Medusa fires a volley of arrows into the sky that land in 3 groups in a line, with each grouping larger than the previous. Enemies struck by a grouping of arrows take 30/70/110/150 physical damage and are rooted, can't turn and take 100 physical damage per second for 0.8/1.2/1.6/2s. Initial Radius: 150. Radius Growth: 50. Cast Range: 625. Mana Cost: 40/60/80/100. Cooldown: 30/27/24/21s

When in ranged form, Troll Warlord has a 20% chance to maim his enemies, slowing their movement speed by 8/16/24/32% and attack speed by 8/16/24/32 for 0.8/1.2/1.6/2.0s and dealing 5/10/15/20 bonus physical damage
